籤詩版本二:
Uzalelwe kusapho olutyebileyo ukusukela ebuntwaneni, yonke into ephambi kwam ihlala inobunewunewu
Ibhanti leGolide eliMsobo ulinikiwe nguMhlekazi, liya kuba lidume kwihlabathi jikelele
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lokuba isango ledragoni linokuvulwa.
Yonke into iya kutshintsha ibe ngcono.
解曰: Amabanjwa axolelwe. Ukugula kuthetha uxolo. ULongmen unethuba lokudibana. Edume kuyo yonke ikomkhulu.
籤詩故事一:
◇ULuo Tong unikela imbeko kuye
Ubukhosi baseTang bahlanganisana ngokupheleleyo ukuze baxolise uMlandeli waseMntla. UMlawuli uTaizong wagqiba ekubeni akhokele olo hambo ngokobuqu, kodwa wayevaleleke kwisiXeko saseMuyang, ngoko ke uCheng Yaojin wabuyela kuMbindi weThafa ukuze ahlangule imikhosi. Ngelishwa, wabanjwa ngamajoni aseMntla. UCheng Yaojin wayeliciko yaye eliciko.Inkosazana uTu Lu yaseBeifan yamthembisa ngokumvumela abuyele kuMbindi weThafa ukuze acele ukuqinisa.
Kukhuphiswano lwe-karate, iinjengele ezoyisa umntla zaqeshwa.U-Luo Tong oneminyaka elishumi elinesixhenxe ubudala waphuma egqwesile waza wathabatha ulawulo lohambo oluya emantla.
(Isaci esithi "uLuotong utshayela emantla" sisikweko somfana ophumeleleyo)
聖意: Thandazela ikhaya kunye nendlu, uzithandazele, uthandazele ithamsanqa ekwindla nasebusika, ithamsanqa kwishishini, umtshato, kunye nethamsanqa eLiujia.
